Articles.Content:
Mm, yes. A battle cruiser from F2I it is. It\'s a prototype, and it doesn\'t have a name yet, so I will be calling it the \'X\'.

In an attempt at replicating The Great Fox, I accidentally stumbled upon a tri-fuselage design that works well and can keep itself from curling up in a ball due to weak points.

I really have nothing else to say about this just yet, it\'s huge, plenty of space for weapons, and will be able to carry troops from planet to planet.

Did I mention how big it is? (The finished version has a few more main wings, so it will come up to about x2.2 times the launch tower)

And no .craft file yet! I will release when this is finished.

Who parked their X-42... on my sandwich?

//Explodes

//Tim laughs maniacally at the controls, firing weapons in all directions.
